strings.evolution:
People who only see the
world through rose-colored glasses
are truly the worst-durst!
strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. Her incredibly high ability is evident from her appointment as secretary in the Heavens Tower, the most important institution to Windurst and its government. She checks on people who visit the tower, serving as the point of contact for adventurers, but it's her way of acting and speaking that has made her beloved by many of the adventurers she meets.
strings.fusion:
Just give me some organic rolanberries
and work-ork as hard as you like!
strings.summon:
Alright!
Let's give this all we've got!
...Got me-wot me?

strings.evolution:
I would not purposely mistake-ake my
incantations over the power of
trust, affection, or friendship!
strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. Assigned to work as a secretary in Windurst's most important institution, Heavens Tower, she has impeccable paperwork handling abilities. Aside from her abilities, she has a very particular way of speaking, a cute way of acting along with a harsh tongue, and a particular fondness of rolanberries, all of which add to her extremely unique personality.
strings.fusion:
Hurry and take me on an adventure!
I want everyone to know of the
wraith a secretary can bestow!
strings.summon:
I have the perfect job for you.
I'm just like that-hat!

strings.affinity:
We've spent quite a lot of time together.
I still want-ont you to ensure I become
even more proficient as a white mage!
strings.description: A female Tarutaru from the distant world of Vana'diel. An excellent white mage working as a secretary in Windurst's Heavens Tower, she has a very peculiar way of speaking. As sweet as her way of speaking and doing things may appear, what she says can be quite biting. However, she is very popular among adventurers, and it said that many visit the tower just to be able to see her.
strings.fusion:
Since I am a white mage,
I can recite magical incantations
as fast as I can without messing up-pup!
strings.summon:
I am Kupipi,
I am a secretary at Heavens Tower
in the Federation of Windurst.
